I am currently working on some cool dataviz helpers for ggplot2 in a new #nflverse package that will be announced soon.
Just put a variable with NFL team abbreviations in your plotting data and the new scales and themes activate team colors and logos as axis labels. https://t.co/xD9nIT67ui
